column1: Uncategorized;Kampot Province:------ The police force of Kampot province
column2: in cooperation with the Provincial Police Department and Traffic Police Office of Takeo province
column3: arrested two car thieves on May 8
column11: Takeo province were caught with the stolen 2003 Camry belonging to  Uy Sarith.------They confessed to committing car thefts in Kampot province: ------– 1st: On January 3
column13: two cars were stolen at Satpong Village
column17: a car was stolen from 1 May Village
column21: the car was stolen at Trapeang Romang Village
column23: Angkor Chey District. ------– And 4th: On April 30
column25: the car was stolen in Prek Kris Village
column27: Kampong Trach District.------The men were taken to Kampot for further proceedings. ------https://kbn.news/archives/122726
